title: OGH - Installing Off Grid Submersible Solar Water Pump for our Developed Spring

tasks.task: Fixing a water pump at the lower cistern.
subtasks: Inspect and assess existing diaphragm pump issue.
Obtain and prepare a new submersible DC pump.
Drill holes for pump lines in the cistern.
Install float valve to prevent pump overruns.
Connect electrical wires for pump and float switch.
Seal pump installation holes with silicone.
Test and ensure proper pumping functionality.
Remove current switch and check wiring.
Test switch connections for correct activation.
Adjust switch polarity for desired functionality.
Secure switch in place and ensure water tightness.
Insulate exposed pipe fittings to prevent freezing.
Verify no leaks at newly installed components.
Replace failed cut-off valve if necessary.
Clean and maintain the water flow path.
